features: 2 STANDARD 3-PRONG AC OUTLETS: This table lamp contains 2 standard US three-prong AC outlets, sturdy and safe, which can charge your scanners, printer, desktop and other devices conveniently. Max power rating for total outlet is 937W.
3 USB CHARGING PORTS: This desk lamp is built in 5V/3A three USB charging ports, which can charge your 3 electronic devices simultaneously. The charging ports can work whether the lamp is on or off.

SOLID WOOD STATION FOR MOST DEVICES: The charging station is made of solid wood, safe and nature feel. It also has 3 phone stands that can hold your 3 devices simultaneously while charging. It's great nightstand lamp for bedrooms or desk lamp for office.

SAVE YOUR SPACE AND KEEP IT NEAT: You can put your phones and other devices on the lamp base, saving the space of your night stand or table or office desk, keep it in neat without mass of cables. It's so useful and beautiful in home or office.

12 HOURS CUSTOMER CARING SERVICE & 12 MONTHS QUALITY CARING: This usb table lamp has 12 months quality caring period, if you have any question during using it, please contact us, we will reply and assist you in 12 hours.
body.description: High Quality and Classical Design Designed with premium cream linen lampshade, this nightstand lamp can emit the abundant light and protect your eyes. It also creates a cozy and warm feeling for your rooms. The walnut color wood base makes the table lamp look more classical. Suitable for all kinds of places, including bedroom, office, livingroom, etc. ( Please note: The USB Table Lamps are not with bulbs so that you can buy it on Amazon or local store to choose different brightness as you like. ) Charging station base size: 9.8''x4.7''x1.6'' Shade: 9.8''x4.7''x7.9' Overall: 9.8''x4.7''x17.3''

Each lamp is good-quality and unique. Explore our wide selection to discover your favorite lamps. Turn on the lights and let them shine!

A useful bedside lamp to put your phone and Pad on the base. Home Decor: Cream linen fabric lampshade delivers a sense of purity and simplicity, walnut colour wooden base provides a vintage style, durable and aesthetic. A ideal USB table lamp for living room, bedroom, study room, kids room, etc. Unique Gift: Decorative and practical desk lamp, what a perfect present for your family or friends as a Christmas, Birthday, Housewarming, Festival gift.

5 Charging Ports This table lamp is designed with Three USB Charging Ports (5V/3A) & Two 3-Prong AC Outlet (Total Max 937W) on the wood lamp base. No need to bend over to find a charger anymore. You can charge your laptop, smartphone, tablet, watch, speaker, etc. simultaneously whether the lamp is on or off.

3 Phone & Pad Slots Bedside Lamp with 3 Phone & Phone Stands on the base, you could put your Phone or Pad together while charging ,working or watching movies. Effective measures to avoid the wires be twisted and keep your table neat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and Aesthetic, Highly Recommend
reviews.reviewText: Would I buy this lamp again or recommend it to someone I know? Absolutely.Pros:• Good value• Shipped on time in perfect condition• Looks great• Dim, soothing, orange lighting (plenty bright depending on the bulb you use)• Multifunctional (lighting and storage)• Super easy to assemble• Clear, simple instructions for any skill level (it's on one sheet of paper)Cons:• Cannot accomdate my iPad (2nd Gen, 12.9") while in its case (it *can* accommodate it with ease when it's out of the case)• Cardboard box and plastic packaging were a bit of a hassle to open (but clearly largely responsible for product showing up in perfect condition-- it was resolved with a standard set of scissors and some patience)• Does not come with a bulb (this is not a huge deal for me-- I'm pretty sure they mentioned it in the description, it's just worth noting)I love mine so far. It was in my budget, and I desperately needed to save space on my nightstand.Between my CPAP, the box of tissues, my glasses, my wallet, and other odds and ends that wind up there by the end of the day, this lamp has decluttered things significantly, and brightened up my room substantially.It has the exact aesthetic I wanted, and it was in my price range-- it gives off a nice, warm, dim, orange glow because of the canvas shade, which is great for winding down at the end of a day.I want to put a less intense bulb in mine soon, I just used what I had around. On a related note, the E26 base on the lamp works with an A19 bulb.The packaging on this lamp is *good* at what it does. This thing showed up in perfect condition, and I credit it largely to this packaging, but the drawback was it was a bit difficult to get the box open, get it out of the box (it was packed in there pretty tightly, I wanted to be careful with it), and unwrap the plastic on the lamp itself (I used scissors on the plastic knotted around the base, and took a while unwraping the top, which had a sturdy ribbon of plastic looped all the way around).I absolutely get why they packaged it the way they did. It was efficient, effective, and conservative at keeping the lamp safe in transit, it was just a bit awkward for the person trying to use the product once it's there.That said, after I got it out of all of the packaging, the rest was a breeze. I had a brief moment of confusion when I tried to put my phone on the lamp base and it didn't fit.As it turns out, if I'd stopped to read the single sheet of instructions for 5 seconds in the first place, I'd know the lamp shows up with the shade screwed on upside down for the sake of saving space in transit.You unscrew the ring holding on the lampshade, flip the shade upside down, screw it back on, screw in your (A19) bulb, plug in your electronic devices and flip the switch, and you'll have a functional lamp in no time flat.The most time consuming part of setting it all up was actually getting it out of all of the packaging, which took about 10 minutes. Total, it took me about 15 minutes.As you pros and avid hobbyists may have figured out, assembling products is not something I do much of. So if you're like me, don't worry, this lamp is novice-friendly.One small thing that I was a bit disappointed by-- I have an iPad Pro (2nd Gen, 12.9") that you see pictured with my review, plugged in and charging on the lamp, in one of the base slots.It absolutely does fit in that slot *without* the case on, but it doesn't fit *with* the case on. I'm a very clumsy person and I don't like to take my devices out of their cases much because they're likely to get broken, so I'll probably store my iPad next to the lamp on the nightstand until I can figure out a better solution.I am absolutely thrilled with it for what I paid. I would highly recommend this lamp if you want to make the most of your space and your money. It's functional, affordable, and it looks gorgeous in here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exceeded my expectations. The lamp was just the right size, not too small and not too big. The shade was the right color to match my color scheme and the lamp was of excellent quality. The wood base holds my cell phone (with the case on) and my Kindle reader perfectly. It uses a 60 watt light bulb, which I had on hand. It is very easy to set up. The outlet and the USB ports worked fine. When turned-on the light gives a warm ambiance to the room. I am very pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size for any room. And I can plug all my stuff into it. Saves space and cuts down on cords all over my nightstands. Looks great too. For the price, this can’t be beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are wonderful!
reviews.reviewText: Great desk lamp, love that it has 2 3-prong outlets (grounded). The on off switch only controls the lamp and the outlets and USB ports stay powered regardless of the switch position (which is a good thing).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This table lamp works well for what it was intended for - to be able to light up a bulb and to be able to charge up my phone. The only gripe I have is that the slots provided for sticking the devices in are too narrow and are basically non functional. So the table lamp now sits on my bedside table, occupying more real estate than it provides value for. The USB port work well and the switch at the base to turn the light on and off is convenient. It also looks good so even though the device slots are useless, it still functions pretty well in the other departments. So all in all, can't complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and Attractive
reviews.reviewText: I needed something to help organize all the various devices that need charging at night. Previously, I was always struggling with reaching behind my nightstand to figure out what cord went with what device. This lamp is attractive and the convenience of having my charging ports where I can see everything without resorting to acrobatics in the dark at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and convenience
reviews.reviewText: It reminds me a lot of the hotel lamp but that’s perfect because it has multiple plugs and a variety of plugs for your cell phone or the plug in something else. We have a very small house and so this little lamp fits perfectly on a small side table, but it puts out a lot of light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: A beautiful modern and elegant table lamp
reviews.reviewText: While this product may be on the smaller side for an end table or bedside table, its size is perfect for me. It is easy to assemble and works well for those of us that have multiple electronics that you want to keep close at hand. It easily fits my Samsung tablet and phone.
It's exactly as described. Love it

The lamp is compact and the outlets both usb and three-prong all work well so far. It was well-packed and arrived in excellent shape. Remember when assembling the lamp to turn the shade upside down from the way it arrives as this gives proper spacing to place your phone, chargers etc.

My son is away at school for the first time and needed a bedside lamp - had this mailed to him and he loves it. He says the lighting is super nice, and he loves the multi-functionality of the various charging options he has. Very happy with this purchase.
